newsitem.title: USA: First Industrial buys Columbus, Ohio, properties.
newsitem.headline: First Industrial buys Columbus, Ohio, properties.

text.p: First Industrial Realty Trust Inc sid Monday it closed a $21.85 million deal to acquire two bulk warehouses totaling 1.1 million square feet in Columbus, Ohio.
First Industrial said the deal was an "umbrella partnership real estate investment trust" transaction, which permits the company to offer partnership units in exchange for properties.
First Industrial said it acquired the portfolio for $21.2 million in cash and the issuance of 24,789 limited partnership units in its First Industrial LP unit.
"We acquired these properties below replacement cost and anticipate yields in excess of 11 percent," Michael Tomasz, president, said in a statement.
